level.heading: DISPLAY AND INSPECTION OF LICENSES (ยง 17-308)

level.text: All licenses shall be subject to examination by any police officer or other authorized official of the District of Columbia government.
Each contractor shall display the license in a frame under a glass in a conspicuous place at the location specified on the license which is accessible for inspection.
Occupational license cards shall be carried on the person of each licensee.
